scripts.analyze: tsup server/index.ts --metafile && bun ./server/utils/analyze.ts && open-cli EsbuildAnalyzer.html && shx rm -rf EsbuildAnalyzer.html
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n FETCH,VITE,SERVE -c cyan,yellow,black "bun run fetch-sanity" "bun run dev:vite" "bun run dev:server"
scripts.build: tsup server/index.ts && shx cp server/config/.vc-config.json .vercel/output/functions/index.func/ && shx cp server/config/vercel.config.json .vercel/output/config.json
